amendment.description: To authorize the Commission by rule to exempt lead crystal from the ban on lead in children's products if the Commission determines that the lead content is not absorbable and does not have an adverse impact on public safety.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4088 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
